de.fraunhofer.fokus.oefit.particity.portlet.org.main

Class MainController

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.fraunhofer.fokus.oefit.particity.portlet.BaseController
      • de.fraunhofer.fokus.oefit.particity.portlet.org.main.MainController

  • @Controller(value="orgMainController")
 @RequestMapping(value="view")
public class MainController
extends de.fraunhofer.fokus.oefit.particity.portlet.BaseController
    Controller for the organisation backend Redirects to org/organization by default
